short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Franchising everything, one web page at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cinematic Universes: all the rage these days. Why can't EVERY universe be a Cinematic Universe?

Now they can!

Look, this thing just drops "cinematic" in front of the word "universe" if it's not already there. That's all it does. It's funny. Trust me.
